sections.heading: General
sections.text:
requirements for state or local petition for initiative or referendum: Must

embrace one subject; must include description of effect.

sections.heading: Requirements
sections.text:
for petition: Number of voters proposing must be apportioned equally among

petition districts and number of signatures required from each petition

district must be equal.

sections.heading: Copy
sections.text:
of petition and certain information to be filed with Secretary of State before

presentation to voters for signatures and after any amendment; effect of

amendment on petition; assignment of unique identifier; determination of fiscal

effect; Legislative Counsel authorized to provide technical suggestions;

posting on Secretary of State�s Internet website.

sections.heading: Withdrawal
sections.text: of petition.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text:
for initiative proposing amendment to Constitution: Secretary of State to use

same number for identification of petition when submitted at successive

elections.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text: for referendum: Filing; submission to voters at general election.

sections.heading: Regulations
sections.text:
specifying format of petition; each document of petition limited to voters of

single petition district; removal of name from petition.

sections.heading: Requirements
sections.text: for submission of signatures to county clerk.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text: may consist of more than one document; circulator�s affidavit.

sections.heading: County
sections.text:
clerk required to make copies of petition and signatures; copies to be made

available to public.

sections.text: to description of petition; challenge to legal sufficiency of petition.

or city clerk must allow witness of determination and verification of
